thread.section_title: CORGI HomePlan Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CORGI HomePlan | corgihomeplan.co.uk | 13 of 179
thread.title: Mr Wallace
thread.title_full: CORGI HomePlan reviewed by Mr Wallace

author: Mr Wallace
title: Mr Wallace
text: The lady at Customer Service advised us on a test for us to carry out. This we did but this did not resolve the problem. When we phoned CS back and reported this we were immediately given an engineers appointment for the following day ( within 24 hours of the first phone call). We received a call from the engineer the following morning and he arrived ahead of schedule. The fault was diagnosed and the parts were obtained and fitted within an hour. Excellent service all round.
